organic.title: Adopt a child from foster care - Shasta County Cares for Kids
organic.snippet: The first step is to get approved as a Shasta County resource family, and you will work directly with the Shasta County Resource Family Approval unit.

organic.title: County Public Adoption Agencies
organic.snippet: County (Public) Adoption Agencies. The majority of county child welfare departments provide agency adoption services for court dependent children.

organic.snippet: Children's Services provides child welfare and children's mental health services, along with an array of other services to children and families in Shasta ...

organic.title: CDSS Adoption Regional Offices
organic.snippet: The California Department of Social Services' (CDSS) Adoption Services Branch (ASB) facilitates adoption of children who need permanent homes.
